specialTraits.name: Keen Sight and Smell
specialTraits.description: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The owlbear makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

actions.name: Beak
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

specialTraits.name: Hold Breath
specialTraits.description: The hydra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

specialTraits.name: Multiple Heads
specialTraits.description: The hydra has five heads. While it has more than one head, the hydra has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

specialTraits.name: Reactive Heads
specialTraits.description: For each head the hydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

specialTraits.name: Wakeful
specialTraits.description: While the hydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The hydra makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

specialTraits.name: Charge
specialTraits.description: If the minotaur moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

specialTraits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
specialTraits.description: The minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

specialTraits.name: Reckless
specialTraits.description: At the start of its turn, the minotaur can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

savingThrow.effect: pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone (only on a charge)
